title: Awakening Joy: 10 Steps That Will Put You on the Road
description:
Awakening Joy: 10 Steps That Will Put You on the Road to Real Happiness by James Baraz, Shoshana Alexander

Overview: Joy is not for just the lucky fewâ€“itâ€™s a choice anyone can make. In this groundbreaking book, based on his popular course, James Baraz helps you discover a path to the happiness thatâ€™s right in front of you, offering a step-by-step program that will reorient your mind away from dissatisfaction and distraction and toward the contentment and delight that is abundantly available in our everyday lives.

You can decide to be happy. For years, James Barazâ€™s online Awakening Joy course has offered participants from around the world the benefits of this simple but profoundly radical proposition. Grounded in simple Buddhist principles but accessible to people of all faithsâ€“or no faith at allâ€“this concept provides the jumping-off point for a transformational journey toward a richer, more meaningful, more positive outlook on life. Now readers everywhere can follow the same ten steps Baraz teaches to his program participants
